rules_text:
Menace[i]
Sharp Fangs[/i] – At the beginning of combat on your turn, another target creature gains menace until end of turn.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Keaton deals combat damage to a player, create a Treasure token.
[i]Beastrune[/i] – Sacrifice three artifacts: Transform Keaton, Rugged Wolfskin.
